content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/tomcat_exporter is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. I should:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand the project
2. Check the pom.xml to see current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.

content.text: I'll help you migrate the Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure and understanding the current setup.

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <packaging>pom</packaging>
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>nl.nlighten</groupId>
    <artifactId>tomcat_exporter</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.18-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <name>Prometheus Tomcat Exporter</name>
    <url>https://github.com/nlighten/tomcat_exporter</url>
    <description>A Prometheus exporter for Apache Tomcat</description>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <scm>
        <connection>scm:git:git@github.com:nlighten/tomcat_exporter.git</connection>
        <developerConnection>scm:git:git@github.com:nlighten/tomcat_exporter.git</developerConnection>
        <url>git@github.com:nlighten/tomcat_exporter.git</url>
        <tag>tomcat_exporter-0.0.16</tag>
    </scm>

    <developers>
        <developer>
            <id>rswart</id>
            <name>Richard Swart</name>
            <email>richard.swart@nlighten.nl</email>
        </developer>
    </developers>

    <modules>
        <module>client</module>
        <module>exporter</module>
    </modules>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <org.apache.tomcat.version>9.0.58</org.apache.tomcat.version>
        <io.prometheus.simpleclient.version>0.15.0</io.prometheus.simpleclient.version>
        <junit.version>4.13.1</junit.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
    </properties>

    <distributionManagement>
        <snapshotRepository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
        </snapshotRepository>
        <repository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/staging/deploy/maven2/</url>
        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.6.8</version>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <serverId>ossrh</serverId>
                    <nexusUrl>https://oss.sonatype.org/</nexusUrl>
                    <autoReleaseAfterClose>true</autoReleaseAfterClose>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>attach-sources</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar-no-fork</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.5.3</version>
                <configuration>
                    <autoVersionSubmodules>true</autoVersionSubmodules>
                    <useReleaseProfile>false</useReleaseProfile>
                    <releaseProfiles>release</releaseProfiles>
                    <goals>deploy</goals>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.8.2</version>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.felix</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-bundle-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>4.2.1</version>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.22.2</version>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                    <docencoding>UTF-8</docencoding>
                    <linksource>true</linksource>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-javadoc-site-report</id>
                        <phase>site</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>javadoc</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>release</id>
            <build>
                <plugins>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>1.5</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>sign-artifacts</id>
                                <phase>verify</phase>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>sign</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.1.0</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-sources</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar-no-fork</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.1.1</version>
                        <configuration>
                            <failOnError>false</failOnError>
                        </configuration>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                </plugins>
            </build>
        </profile>
    </profiles>

</project>

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <parent>
        <groupId>nl.nlighten</groupId>
        <artifactId>tomcat_exporter</artifactId>
        <version>0.0.18-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </parent>

    <artifactId>tomcat_exporter_client</artifactId>
    <packaging>jar</packaging>

    <name>Prometheus client for Apache Tomcat</name>
    <description>Collector of various Tomcat metrics</description>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient_servlet</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient_servlet_common</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient_hotspot</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat-catalina</artifactId>
            <version>${org.apache.tomcat.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat-jdbc</artifactId>
            <version>${org.apache.tomcat.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat-dbcp</artifactId>
            <version>${org.apache.tomcat.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <!-- Test Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>${junit.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.embed</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat-embed-core</artifactId>
            <version>${org.apache.tomcat.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.rest-assured</groupId>
            <artifactId>rest-assured</artifactId>
            <version>4.1.1</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
            <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.210</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.22.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <forkCount>1</forkCount>
                    <reuseForks>false</reuseForks>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <parent>
        <groupId>nl.nlighten</groupId>
        <artifactId>tomcat_exporter</artifactId>
        <version>0.0.18-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </parent>

    <artifactId>tomcat_exporter_servlet</artifactId>
    <packaging>war</packaging>

    <name>Tomcat Prometheus Exporter Servlet</name>
    <description>Prometheus HTTP servlet exporter for Apache Tomcat</description>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.prometheus</groupId>
            <artifactId>simpleclient_common</artifactId>
            <version>${io.prometheus.simpleclient.version}</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>nl.nlighten</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat_exporter_client</artifactId>
            <version>0.0.9</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.servlet-api</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.1</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        <!-- Test Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>${junit.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.2.3</version>
                <configuration>
                    <failOnMissingWebXml>false</failOnMissingWebXml>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

Great! The build succeeded with `mvn clean verify`. The warnings about adding `--add-opens` flags are expected when running Java 9+ with certain reflective operations, but they are just warnings and don't cause the build to fail. Let me verify once more that the migration is complete by checking the final pom.xml files:

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The `mvn clean verify` command passes with exit code 0. 

Here's what was updated during the migration:

## Summary of Changes:

### Parent POM (`pom.xml`):
1. **Java version updated**: Changed from Java 8 (1.8) to Java 17
   - `maven.compiler.source`: 1.8 → 17
   - `maven.compiler.target`: 1.8 → 17
   - Added `maven.compiler.release`: 17

2. **Dependency versions updated**:
   - Apache Tomcat: 9.0.58 → 9.0.98
   - Prometheus SimpleClient: 0.15.0 → 0.16.0
   - JUnit: 4.13.1 → 4.13.2

3. **Maven plugin versions updated to Java 17 compatible versions**:
   - nexus-staging-maven-plugin: 1.6.8 → 1.6.13
   - maven-source-plugin: 3.1.0 → 3.3.1
   - maven-release-plugin: 2.5.3 → 3.1.1
   - maven-deploy-plugin: 2.8.2 → 3.1.3
   - maven-bundle-plugin: 4.2.1 → 5.1.9
   - maven-surefire-plugin: 2.22.2 → 3.5.2
   - maven-javadoc-plugin: 3.1.1 → 3.11.2
   - maven-gpg-plugin: 1.5 → 3.2.7

### Client POM (`client/pom.xml`):
- rest-assured: 4.1.1 → 5.5.0
- H2 database: 2.1.210 → 2.3.232
- maven-surefire-plugin: 2.22.2 → 3.5.2

### Exporter POM (`exporter/pom.xml`):
- javax.servlet-api: 3.0.1 → 4.0.1
- maven-war-plugin: 3.2.3 → 3.4.0

All tests pass successfully (9 tests run, 0 failures), and the build completes without errors. The project is now fully migrated to Java 17!
